name: ManageBudget
description:
Create or update a budget in Datadog.

This tool allows you to create a new budget or update an existing budget using the Datadog API.

parameters.name: budget_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing all necessary details for creating or updating a budget. Include attributes like the creation timestamp, user id, budget amounts, start and end months, and any specific tags. Ensure the 'type' field is set to 'budget'.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the budget was created.

created_by.description: The id of the user that created the budget.

end_month.description: The month when the budget ends.

metrics_query.description: The cost query used to track against the budget.

org_id.description: The id of the org the budget belongs to.

start_month.description: The month when the budget starts.

total_amount.description: The sum of all budget entries' amounts.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the budget was last updated.

updated_by.description: The id of the user that created the budget.

type.description: The type of the object, must be `budget`.

data.description: A budget and all its entries.
